attributes.action: Stop the godstone road traffic scheme endangering Biggles' house
attributes.additional_details: STOP THE GODSTONE ROW TRAFFIC SCHEME. Lingfield, Surrey, UK.  Home of 'Biggles' author, W.E. Johns, is being damaged by traffic. Council ignores damage to Listed Building for 11 years!! Developers ignore damage to Listed Building.Godstone Road traffic scheme endangers home of author W.E.Johns - a 15th Century Listed Building. Surrey County Council ignore the fact that lorries hit the thatched roof.  W E Johns was a famous author and the house is 15th century and listed. It ,must be saved. Stop the traffic scheme!

rejection.details: This is a matter for Surrey County Council.  It is for local councillors to decide on their transport policy.  If you believe that there has been maladministration at the Council, and you have exhausted avenues of enquiry with your local councillor, you may wish to consider speaking to the Local Government Ombudsman.
